ygData.subject: RE: <-------idiot
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed, report this now and don t stop until you get an answer.  There is an old saying that I think applies here: Fool me once shame on you, fool me twice
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed, report this now and don't stop until you get an answer. There is an
old saying that I think applies here:

Fool me once shame on you, fool me twice shame on me.

You are no idiot for trusting someone you could not have known could not be
trusted. I sad lesson to learn but it seems that your perspective is such
that you will have learned from the situation without allowing it to harden
you.

Good luck and please keep us posted, also, what was this persons char name?
It needs to be posted to all the message boards.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 10:46 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot
>
>
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Ack, I am very sorry to hear your misfortune.
> Now, this is the type of person I am but I would be really
> pissed right
> now, you should report this person to a GM, I am sure
> something can be done
> because I remember reading a post on www.everquest.com about
> a guy who was
> given consent, looted the corpse and then logged, he posted
> saying that his
> brother wanted to play, well anyway, the gm's banned his
> account, he then
> logged onto his brother account and got that one banned, he
> then continued
> to get another brothers account banned. The GM's also got the
> equipment
> back for this unfortunate person who had it stolen from him.
>
> Go report this person NOW. He deserves all he gets for being
> such an ass
> hole.
>
> Ok, rant over. Goodluck, I hope you get your stuff back.
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 40 Songs <Guardians of Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
>
> "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> on 02/03/2000 15:19:41
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot
>
>
>
>
> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> Hello everyone :)
>
> Well I just wanted to tell you a little tale so that you can
> all remember
> not to make my mistakes. Last night, I made the mistake of consenting
> someone to drag Tani's corpse out of the Scryer room in Guk.
> Well, long
> story short, all my armor and weapons were stolen (punishment
> for twinking,
> heh) by this guy.
>
> There are all sorts of complicating sidelines to this story which I'll
> spare
> you. Although I know it was always a risk, I just never
> thought someone
> would be so mean and viscious. The items are just items, but
> people that
> do
> that stuff just plain suck!
>
> Guess I'll have to make a contest to see how much of my quest
> stuff I can
> get back in one week.
>
> Hope you're all having a great day... and DON'T CONSENT
> SOMEONE YOU DON'T
> KNOW!!!
> (most of you have probably figured that out - guess I get to
> wear the naive
> banner for the week)
>
> Tani 20th nekkid Bard
> Halana 50th Shamana
> Solusek Ro
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
